item.description:
We will meet in the back parking area of Pier One closest to the trail entry and plan to start running north on the trail at 9:00am. Distance and pace will vary so beginners should not be intimidated.

Since the paved trail in not cleared of snow and ice use your own discretion during questionable conditions but try to change your RSVP accordingly.

Round Trip Miles:

6.2 Miles to Sherman Ave. Lot and Back ( 10k )

8.0 Miles to Todd Street Lot and Back

10.0 Miles to Shepard Avenue and Back

13.2 miles to Mount Sanford Road and Back ( Half Marathon )

14.2 miles to South Brooksvale Road and Back

16.0 miles to North Brooksvale Road and Back

17.0 miles to Higgins Road and Back

19.0 miles to Cornwall Road and Back
item.name: Pier 1 - Sunday Run
